structured_content.heading: DataViz: Hands-on Workshop and Data Visualization
Competition
content: Date: Time:  17/09/2025
Time: 08:30 AM – 11:00 AM
Venue: AV Hall (Library) , St. Joseph’s College of Engineering

structured_content.heading: INTRODUCTION
content: The Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, in collaboration with the
Data Analytics Club, successfully organized a Hands-on Workshop on Data
Visualization, followed by a Data Visualization Competition. The workshop was
designed for both 1st-year and 2nd-year students, enabling them to gain exposure to
data analytics concepts and visualization techniques. The competition, on the other
hand, was conducted exclusively for 2nd-year students, giving them an opportunity to
demonstrate their skills and creativity in applying what they had learned.

structured_content.heading: Inaugural Session
content: The event began with the Tamil Thai Valthu, honoring our culture and traditions.
Following this, the Data Analytics Club Mascot Video was displayed, marking the vision
and identity of the club. Our Founder of the Data Analytics Club, Mr. Kiruthik Kumar J
(Final Year Student), addressed the gathering with a motivational speech, sharing his
vision for the club and encouraging students to actively participate in upcoming
activities. This was followed by a short address by our President, Mr. Syed Aejaz
Ahmed A, who spoke about the mission of the club and the importance of data
visualization in today’s world, setting the tone for the day’s workshop.

raw_lines: DataViz: Hands-on Workshop and Data Visualization
Competition
Date: Time:  17/09/2025
Time: 08:30 AM – 11:00 AM
Venue: AV Hall (Library) , St. Joseph’s College of Engineering
INTRODUCTION
The Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, in collaboration with the
Data Analytics Club, successfully organized a Hands-on Workshop on Data
Visualization, followed by a Data Visualization Competition. The workshop was
designed for both 1st-year and 2nd-year students, enabling them to gain exposure to
data analytics concepts and visualization techniques. The competition, on the other
hand, was conducted exclusively for 2nd-year students, giving them an opportunity to
demonstrate their skills and creativity in applying what they had learned.
Inaugural Session
The event began with the Tamil Thai Valthu, honoring our culture and traditions.
Following this, the Data Analytics Club Mascot Video was displayed, marking the vision
and identity of the club. Our Founder of the Data Analytics Club, Mr. Kiruthik Kumar J
(Final Year Student), addressed the gathering with a motivational speech, sharing his
vision for the club and encouraging students to actively participate in upcoming
activities. This was followed by a short address by our President, Mr. Syed Aejaz
Ahmed A, who spoke about the mission of the club and the importance of data
visualization in today’s world, setting the tone for the day’s workshop.
Workshop Session

structured_content.text: The Hands-on Workshop was conducted by Mr. Syed Aejaz Ahmed A, President of the
Data Analytics Club. The workshop provided a strong foundation in Data Visualization,
combining conceptual clarity with live demonstrations. Students were given step-by-
step guidance, with opportunities to try out techniques themselves, ensuring a truly
interactive experience. Participants from both 1st-year and 2nd-year actively engaged
in the session, asked questions, and gained practical exposure to visualization tools.

structured_content.heading: Competition Segment
content: The winners of the competition were:
1st Place – Dualytics
Santhosh M and Sherin Ovia
2nd Place – Data Miners
Priyanka S and Pavithra
3rd Place – Moon Knight
Kumaran and Mannan

structured_content.heading: Certificate Distribution
content: The Certificate Distribution Ceremony was graced by our respected Head of the
Department, Dr. L. Sherly Annabel, who presented certificates to the winners and
participants. Ma’am also shared encouraging words, motivating students to continue
exploring opportunities in the field of data analytics.

raw_lines: The Hands-on Workshop was conducted by Mr. Syed Aejaz Ahmed A, President of the
Data Analytics Club. The workshop provided a strong foundation in Data Visualization,
combining conceptual clarity with live demonstrations. Students were given step-by-
step guidance, with opportunities to try out techniques themselves, ensuring a truly

Santhosh M and Sherin Ovia
2nd Place – Data Miners
Priyanka S and Pavithra
3rd Place – Moon Knight
Kumaran and Mannan
Certificate Distribution
The Certificate Distribution Ceremony was graced by our respected Head of the
Department, Dr. L. Sherly Annabel, who presented certificates to the winners and
participants. Ma’am also shared encouraging words, motivating students to continue
exploring opportunities in the field of data analytics.

structured_content.heading: Vote of Thanks
content: Gratitude was expressed to: Mr. Kiruthik Kumar J (Founder) and Mr. Syed Aejaz
Ahmed A (President), for their leadership and vision. Mr. Syed Aejaz Ahmed A, for
conducting the engaging workshop. Dr. L. Sherly Annabel (HOD), for her presence
during the certificate distribution and her continuous support. Faculty Coordinators and
Organizing Team, for their efforts in executing the program successfully. All
participants, for their enthusiasm and active involvement.

structured_content.heading: Conclusion
content: The Hands-on Workshop and Data Visualization Competition proved to be a highly
enriching and impactful event. The workshop benefited both 1st-year and 2nd-year
students, helping them gain confidence in handling data visualization tools. The
competition, conducted for 2nd-year students, provided a platform to showcase
creativity, teamwork, and technical ability. The event concluded with certificate
distribution and words of encouragement from the HOD, leaving students motivated to
further strengthen their data analytics skills.

The Hands-on Workshop and Data Visualization Competition proved to be a highly
enriching and impactful event. The workshop benefited both 1st-year and 2nd-year
students, helping them gain confidence in handling data visualization tools. The
competition, conducted for 2nd-year students, provided a platform to showcase
creativity, teamwork, and technical ability. The event concluded with certificate

further strengthen their data analytics skills.
